title: Patient-centered medical home model improves chronic disease management

title_detail.value: Patient-centered medical home model improves chronic disease management

summary: Data from more than 800 Veterans Health Administration (VHA) primary care clinics revealed that national implementation of a patient-centered medical home model was effective at improving several chronic disease outcomes over time.

summary_detail.value: Data from more than 800 Veterans Health Administration (VHA) primary care clinics revealed that national implementation of a patient-centered medical home model was effective at improving several chronic disease outcomes over time.
